name: Sailcloth
description:
Sailcloth is a puzzle platformer made in 2 weeks (!) for Pandan Jam 01.  Gather sailcloths and use them to float, fly, and sail boats across 12 short levels, including 2 boss fights.  Supports both keyboard and XInput gamepad controls.

Get the soundtrack here:  https://plastiware.bandcamp.com/album/sailcloth-original-soundtrack
